citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 13:15-13:45
on 03-Jan-18.
Arrived at facility to find no persons with which to conduct the inspection. Provided phone number was not
answered. Left voice mail for owner.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 13:15-13:45
on 03-Jan-18.
Arrived at facility to find no persons with which to conduct the inspection.  Provided phone number was not
answered.  Left voice mail for owner.
